name: Caster from the Mage Guild
text:
1 Non-Link Spellcaster Monster
If you can Pendulum Summon Level 3 you can Pendulum Summon this face-up card in your Extra Deck. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Mage Guild" monster you control; Destroy it, then add 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card leaves the field you can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck except Spellcasters. If you Special Summon a "Mage Guild" monster(s): You can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Caster from the Mage Guild" once per turn.
